009package imagingbook.common.util;
010
011/**
012 * <p>
013 * An elementary "handle" mechanism to facilitate indirect (two-stage)
014 * references to objects. The main purpose is to allow true "calls by
015 * reference", as shown in the example below.
016 * </p>
017 * <pre>
018 * private static void foo(Handle&gt;Intege&lt; h) {
019 *      h.set(33);
020 * }
021 * 
022 * public static void main(String[] args) {
023 *      Handle&gt;Integer&lt; a1 = Handle.of(10);
024 *      Handle&gt;Integer&lt; a2 = Handle.&gt;Integer&lt;of(10);
025 * 
026 *      Handle&gt;Double&lt; b = new Handle&gt;&lt;(10.0);
027 *      Handle&gt;String&lt; s = Handle.of("prima!");
028 * 
029 *      System.out.println("orig a = " + a1.get());
030 * 
031 *      // Example: call by reference (foo() modifies the contents of a1)
032 *      foo(a1);
033 *      System.out.println("modified a = " + a1.get());
034 * }
035 * </pre>
036 * 
037 * 
038 * @author WB
039 *
040 * @param <T> the element type of this handle
041 */
042public class Handle<T> {
043        
044        private T obj;
045                
046        public Handle(T obj) {
047                this.obj = obj;
048        }
049        
050        public T get() {
051                return this.obj;
052        }
053        
054        public void set(T obj) {
055                this.obj = obj;
056        }
057        
058        public static <T> Handle<T> of(T obj) {
059                return new Handle<T>(obj);
060        }
061        
062        // ---------------------------------------------
063        
064        private static void foo(Handle<Integer> h) {
065                h.set(33);
066        }
067
068        
069        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
070        public static void main(String[] args) {
071                Handle<Integer> a1 = Handle.of(10);
072                Handle<Integer> a2 = Handle.<Integer>of(15);
073                
074                Handle<Double> b = new Handle<>(10.0);
075                Handle<String> s = Handle.of("prima!");
076                
077                System.out.println("orig a = " + a1.get());
078                
079                // Example: call by reference (foo modifies the contents of a1)
080                foo(a1);
081                System.out.println("modified a = " + a1.get());
082        }
083
084
085}
